name: moonwalking
content:
moonwalking noun [U]
(ON MOON)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of walking on the moon: The public now sees moonwalking as something the average citizen might actually be able to do one day.
More examplesFewer examplesMany years after those first steps on the moon, one astronaut remembers the romance and reality of moonwalking.This was actual moonwalking, on the moon.

moonwalking noun [U]
(DANCE)
the act of doing a dance step in which you walk backwards in a smooth movement, sliding your feet along the floor: I'm still trying to perfect my moonwalking. He's a Michael Jackson impersonator, doing his moonwalking on the streets of Paris. See
moonwalk
More examplesFewer examplesI practised moonwalking in my bedroom.There's the TV interviews, awards, and the new show about moonwalking.I have attempted Michael Jackson's style of moonwalking.
